publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3685 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Establishment of a Consolidation Committee-That the Parliament agrees to establish a Consolidation Committee of the Parliament as follows- Name of Committee: Salmon and Freshwater Fisheries (Consolidation) (Scotland) Bill Committee Remit: To consider the Salmon and Freshwater Fisheries (Consolidation) (Scotland) Bill Duration: Until the Bill is passed, or falls or is otherwise no longer in progress Convenership: The Convener will be a member of the Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party and the Deputy Convener a member of the Labour Party Membership: Brian Fitzpatrick, Murdo Fraser, Duncan Hamilton, Gordon Jackson and John Farquhar Munro. Supported by: Euan Robson*
